reviews.review_msg: He and his TA marked harder than profs marked me for 4th year courses and I felt that the research potential and materials available to use was not very interesting (but since the point of the course was for 1st/2nd years there's not much that can be done). Kev was insanely dedicated to his job and went out of his way to help. TA could be better.

Kevin Lam is by far one of the best profs in Simon Fraser U, and this course is reflective of his skills as an instructor. He's a tough grader, and tons of work is involved (the most I've ever had)-- but the lab allows for exciting research exposure very rarely offered to newer students and is sure to peak the interest of Science-lovers.
